title: You mean everything to me
lyrics: tone gốc Gm capo 3 chơi You are the answer to my lonely prayer You are an angel from a bove I was so lonely till you came to me With the wonder of your love I don't know how I ever lived before You are my life, my destiny Oh my darling, I love you so ........You mean everything to me .......... If you should ever, ever go away There would be lonely tears to cry The sun above would be never shine again There would be teardrops in the sky So hold me close and never let me go And say our love will always be Oh, my darling, I love you so .......You mean everything to me .............. ........ So hold me close and never let me go And say our love will always be Oh, my darling, I love you so .............You mean everything to me .................
